name: Slam a Dice
description:
Simple idea in which you play against an AI or another player to hit a sphere towards your opponent's side. More hits would have caused the sphere to break down until it becomes a dice, at which point, the last hit would grant random stat bonuses.

As of now it you can hit the dice and watch it bounce around collecting stats.

WASD for movements, hold and release spacebar for a charge, and hold Z to sprint.
